Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Radisson Blu Hotel Ludhiana in Ludhiana, you'll be in a shopping district and close to Punjab Agricultural University and Nehru Rose Garden. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Guru Nanak Stadium and Maharaja Ranjit Singh Fort.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and shopping on site.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed
